[[General]]
  [key1]
    en = key1-english
    tags = tag1
    comment = This is a comment
    es = key1-spanish
    fr = key1-french

[[My Strings]]
  [key2]
    ref = [key1]
  [key3]
    ref = [key1]
    fr = key3-french
  [key4]
    ref = [key1]
    comment = Different comment
  [key5]
    ref = [key1]
    tags = tag2
